meanings.definition: A large, mature cultivated mushroom with an open, flat cap
meanings.sent1: I grilled a juicy portobello for my burger.
meanings.sent2: The chef sautéed the portobello mushrooms for the pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the portobello refuse to dance? It was a fungi.
meanings.sent4: The portobello stood tall among the other mushrooms like a giant umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The earthy aroma of the portobello filled the kitchen as it cooked.

meanings.definition: A type of mushroom commonly used in cooking, especially in vegetarian dishes
meanings.sent1: My favorite pizza topping is portobello mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious portobello stir-fry for dinner.
meanings.sent3: What did the picky eater say about the portobello? It was a fungi-guy.
meanings.sent4: The portobello added a meaty texture to the vegetarian lasagna.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the portobello enhanced the taste of the soup.
